Token.Abstract: The NChartSeriesSettings class provides basic container for settings that are to be applied for all the series of particular type that are added to the chart. For different types of series there are different classes of containers that are inherited from NChartSeriesSettings. You can add the settings to the chart via addSeriesSettings: method of NChart. The settings are applied to the series while call of NChart.

ReturnValue.Abstract: an autoreleased instance of the series.
